mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, REF, STEP, DEPTH FROM QNA ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (NUM, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, REGDATE, HIT,REF,STEP,DEPTH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} WHERE NUM=#{num}
